net.sf.JRecord.Common

Class Conversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.Common.Conversion

  • public final class Conversion
extends java.lang.Object
    This static class holds various conversion routines

    Bruce Martin

        public static void setLongLow2High(byte[] record,
                   int pos,
                   int len,
                   long val,
                   boolean isPositive)
        Load a long into the Record (Little Endian format -> low to high byte).
        Parameters:
        record - Full record which is to be updated
        pos - position in the Record to put the value
        len - field length
        val - value to move to the record
        isPositive - wethear the field represents only positive integers

      • decodeCharStr

        public static java.lang.String decodeCharStr(java.lang.String charId,
                             java.lang.String font,
                             char defaultChar)
        The input to this method can be either:
        • A single character
        • A character represented in unicode format: \\u0001 (\\u followed by the character code in hex format).
        Parameters:
        charId - character id to be decoded
        Returns:
        character decoded character.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException
